meanings.definition: State or condition of health, fitness, or readiness.
meanings.sent1: His fettle improved after he started exercising regularly.
meanings.sent2: The athlete's fettle was evident in his performance on the field.
meanings.sent3: She joked that her cat was in better fettle than she was.
meanings.sent4: The old car was in such poor fettle that it barely started.
meanings.sent5: The soldier's fettle determined his ability to complete the mission.
